abstract: Rupert Murdoch announced the News Corporation would invest $100 million in six regional television channels in India, and he unveiled a new Dow Jones index to track Indian stock markets.
snippet: Rupert Murdoch announced the News Corporation would invest $100 million in six regional television channels in India, and he unveiled a new Dow Jones index to track Indian stock markets.
lead_paragraph: Deepening the News Corporation’s extensive presence in Indian media, the chairman, Rupert Murdoch, announced on Monday that the company would invest $100 million in six new regional television channels there, and he introduced a new Dow Jones index to track the Indian stock markets.

headline.main: Six New TV Channels in India to Increase Murdoch’s Profile
headline.print_headline: Six New TV Channels in India To Increase Murdoch’s Profile
